alert.note: Alert for Kittson; Norman; West Marshall; West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 12:36AM CST until January 27 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Minimal additional snow accumulation. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Minimal additional snow accumulation. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Minnesota and northeast and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until noon CST today. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 2 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Very difficult to impossible travel conditions expected. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce the visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Worst conditions will occur in open country outside of sheltered areas.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Kittson; Norman; West Marshall; West Polk
